red_butte.name: Red Butte Walk
red_butte.pdf_box: Take a walk at Red Butte Garden. Visit 10 times to earn WellU credit.

full.text: Get out and enjoy a walk at Red Butte Garden. Getting out for a brisk walk after eating can help lower blood sugar levels and keep your A1c levels low. A great place to walk around campus is the Red Butte Garden. Employees enjoy free access to Red Butte Garden and if you scan your card 10  times and go for a walk through the beautiful gardens you will earn credit towards your premium reduction!

weight_management.name: Weight Management Resource Link
weight_management.pdf_box: Schedule/register (action) For vague resources (learn about or learn more)

full.text: We understand that making changes to your health can feel overwhelming, and sometimes the first step is simply giving yourself time.
When you're ready, we're here to support you. In the meantime, here are some helpful resources you can explore at your own pace—no pressure, just possibilities.

peak_nutrition.name: PEAK Nutrition Consultation
peak_nutrition.pdf_box: Schedule your free PEAK nutrition consultation.

full.text: Looking to improve your eating habits without the stress of strict diets? In this 60-minute one-on-one session, our expert will help you create a personalized nutrition plan that fits your lifestyle, preferences, and goals.
What you can expect:
Practical, sustainable strategies tailored to you
Guidance rooted in your real-life routines—not rigid meal plans
Support to help you build long-term, healthy habits
A focus on progress, not perfection
Empower yourself to make lasting changes that feel good and work for you.
Schedule your consultation today: visit: https://booknow.appointment-plus.com/165ehg4e/10#Appointment

personal_training.name: I want to schedule a free Personal Training session
personal_training.pdf_box: Schedule your free PEAK personal training session.

full.text: This 60-minute session is all about you. Whether you're just starting out or looking to level up your routine, our expert PEAK personal trainers provide personalized guidance to help you move with confidence and purpose.
In your session, you can:
Perfect your form and technique
Explore new and exciting workouts
Build a customized fitness plan
Enjoy a motivating, energizing workout tailored to your goals
No matter where you are on your fitness journey, we're here to support and challenge you—every step of the way.

pcp.name: I want to work on this area with my primary care provider
pcp.pdf_box: Find a primary care provider to address your health concerns.

full.text: Partner with your Primary Care Provider for better health. Meeting with your primary care provider is a powerful step toward improving your overall well-being. Together, you can create a personalized plan to address your health risks and support your long-term goals.

Don't have a provider yet or looking for someone new? Our Primary Care Navigation Team is here to help you find the right fit—someone who understands your needs and supports your journey to better health. Click HERE to learn more. https://healthcare.utah.edu/primary-care/appointment

health_coaching.name: I want to schedule a free Health Coaching session
health_coaching.pdf_box: Schedule your free health coaching session.

full.text: Ready to take charge of your well-being? Our expert health coach offers one-on-one guidance tailored to your unique goals and lifestyle. Whether you're looking to boost energy, manage stress, improve nutrition, or build sustainable habits, we're here to help you succeed.
With PEAK Health Coaching, you'll get:
Personalized goal setting and action plans
Ongoing motivation and accountability
Expert strategies for lasting lifestyle changes
Support every step of the way
Start your journey to better health today—your future self will thank you.

noom.name: I want to learn more about  Noom Weight Management

lifestyle_medicine.name: I want to learn about the  Lifestyle Medicine Consultation
lifestyle_medicine.pdf_box: Learn more about Lifestyle Medicine Consultaion.

full.text: Chronic conditions don't have to define your future. With Lifestyle Medicine, you can take control of your health through sustainable, evidence-based changes in how you live each day.
In your comprehensive consultation, a lifestyle medicine provider will assess key areas of your well-being, including:
Nutrition
Physical activity
Sleep quality
Stress management
Social support and connection
You'll receive:
A personalized action plan tailored to your goals
Expert guidance to help you make lasting changes
Ongoing support and accountability
The potential to reduce or even reverse symptoms of chronic disease
Empower yourself to live better—starting now.
Learn more and request your consultation here: https://healthcare.utah.edu/integrative-health/services/lifestyle-medicine

metabolic_health.name: Metabolic Health Resource Link
metabolic_health.pdf_box: Schedule/register (action) For vague resources (learn about or learn more)

full.text: We understand that making changes to your health can feel overwhelming, and sometimes the first step is simply giving yourself time.
When you're ready, we're here to support you. In the meantime, here are some helpful resources you can explore at your own pace—no pressure, just possibilities.

Visiting with your primary care provider is a great place to start. If you need help finding a primary care provider our care navigation team can help. https://healthcare.utah.edu/primary-care/appointment

ndpp.name: I want to register for the National Diabetes Prevention Program (NDPP)
ndpp.pdf_box: Register for the National Diabetes Prevention Program (NDPP)

full.text: The National DPP is a proven, year-long lifestyle change program designed to help you prevent or delay the onset of Type 2 diabetes through small, achievable steps. With the support of a trained lifestyle coach and a group of peers, you'll learn how to:
Eat healthier without giving up the foods you love
Get active in ways that fit your life
Manage stress and stay motivated
Build habits that last a lifetime
This isn't a diet. It's a lifestyle shift- backed by science and built for real life.
Join today and take the first step toward a healthier future.

ilp.name: I want to register for the Intensive Lifestyle Program (ILP)
ilp.pdf_box: Register for the Intensive Lifestyle Program (ILP)

full.text: Ready to take control of your health and well-being? Join our Intensive Lifestyle Program - powerful 10-week journey designed to help you build lasting habits for a healthier, more energized life.
In this dynamic, group-based program, you'll explore the foundations of:
Movement - Find joy in staying active
Nutrition - Learn to fuel your body with confidence
Stress Management - Discover tools to feel more balanced and in control
Each week, you'll gain practical strategies, expert guidance, and the support of a like-minded community - all focused on helping you create real, sustainable change.
Don't just make a resolution - make a lifestyle.

exercise_prescription.name: I want to schedule a free Exercise Prescription

full.text: This 60-minute session is designed to help you move smarter, not just harder. Whether you're managing a health condition, recovering from injury, or simply looking for a safe and effective way to stay active, our expert team will create a customized exercise plan tailored to your unique needs and goals.
In your session, you'll:
Receive a personalized exercise prescription based on your health status and fitness level
Learn proper form and technique to move safely and effectively
Explore exercises that fit your lifestyle and preferences
Gain confidence and motivation to stay active long-term
No matter your starting point, we'll help you move forward- safely, confidently, and with purpose.

Join our hands-on Nutrition Workshops and discover how to create simple, nutritious, and delicious meals. Whether you're a beginner or just looking for fresh ideas, these interactive sessions will introduce you to new recipes and practical tips for incorporating healthy ingredients into your everyday routine.
What you'll get:
Fun, hands-on cooking experiences
Easy, nutritious recipes to try at home
Tips for making healthy eating sustainable and enjoyable
A variety of rotating topics to keep things fresh
Everyone eats- why not learn to do it better?

Check out our current workshops and register today:Join a Nutrition Workshop to learn how to make  nutritious meals, fun and easy.  https://app.healthcare.utah.edu/peakCourseRegistration/byCategory?categoryPrimaryId=6
We understand that making changes to your health can feel overwhelming, and sometimes the first step is simply giving yourself time.
When you're ready, we're here to support you. In the meantime, here are some helpful resources you can explore at your own pace-no pressure, just possibilities.
Nutrition Resource Link

intruitive_eating.name: I want to register for an Intuitive Eating class
intruitive_eating.pdf_box: Register for an Intuitive Eating class

full.text: Discover Intuitive Eating: Let go of diets and reconnect with your body. Intuitive Eating helps you build a healthy, joyful relationship with food, movement, and self-care- no matter your size.
You'll learn to:
Enjoy food without guilt
Move your body to feel good
Respect and appreciate your body
Let go of diet rules
Nourish yourself with kindness
Backed by decades of research, Intuitive Eating is linked to:
Better body image and self-confidence
More satisfaction with food
Greater self-compassion
Less anxiety, guilt, and binge eating

fitness_assessment.name: I want to schedule a Fitness Assessment

full.text: You've been putting in the work - now it's time to see the results. A PEAK Fitness Assessment is a great way to evaluate your current fitness level and set meaningful, personalized goals for the future.
During this 60-minute session, we'll assess key areas of your fitness, including:
Cardiovascular endurance
Muscular strength and endurance
Flexibility
Body composition
You'll receive a detailed report comparing your results to age-based norms, along with expert recommendations to help you improve or maintain your fitness.

We understand that making changes to your health can feel overwhelming, and sometimes the first step is simply giving yourself time. PEAK health and fitness is ready to help you along your path to better well-being. We have a number of programs and services that can help no matter your fitness level or ability we can help you reach your goals.
When you're ready, we're here to support you. In the meantime, here are some helpful resources you can explore at your own pace - no pressure, just possibilities.
https://health.utah.edu/peak

fitness_class.name: I want to register for an activity/fitness class
fitness_class.pdf_box: Resister for a PEAK fitness class

full.text: Looking for a fun and convenient way to stay active? Join a fitness class right here on campus! Whether you prefer in-person or virtual workouts, there's something for everyone:
PEAK Health and Fitness offers a wide variety of employee-only fitness classes - available both virtually and at locations across campus.
Student Life Center provides access to dynamic group fitness classes with a membership.
Tanner Dance features adult fitness classes that blend movement and creativity.

No matter your schedule or fitness level, there's a class to help you feel your best. Explore your options and sign up today:  https://app.healthcare.utah.edu/peakCourseRegistration/byCategories   https://campusrec.utah.edu/group-fitness/  https://shop.tannerdance.utah.edu/tickets/events/adult-osher

Managing your stress is a great way to guarantee better health!   Our Mindfulness Classes offer practical tools to help you slow down, breathe deeply, and live more intentionally - no matter your background or experience level.
We offer three unique class options to meet your needs:
Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction (MBSR)
An evidence-based program designed to help you manage stress, anxiety, and chronic pain through meditation, gentle movement, and self-awareness practices.
Everyday Mindfulness
Perfect for beginners or those looking to build a consistent practice. Learn simple, effective techniques to bring mindfulness into your daily life - at work, at home, and everywhere in between.
Flourishing in Medicine
Created specifically for medical team members, this class focuses on resilience, emotional well-being, and connection in high-stress healthcare environments.
Each class is guided by experienced instructors and offers a supportive, welcoming environment to help you grow your practice and improve your well-being.
Mindfulness Classes: https://app.healthcare.utah.edu/peakCourseRegistration/byCategory?categoryPrimaryId=60
Curalinc Online Resources LINK

mindfulness_class.name: I want to join a Mindfulness Class

We offer three unique class options to meet your needs:
Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction (MBSR)
An evidence-based program designed to help you manage stress, anxiety, and chronic pain through meditation, gentle movement, and self-awareness practices.

stress_eap.name: I want to learn about SupportLinc employee assistance program
stress_eap.pdf_box: Supportlinc Employee Assistance Program (Use group code: uofu)

full.text: You indicated the you would like to talk to someone about your stress level.
The Employee Assistance Program (EAP) has trained professionals available to help you manage your stress. To speak to someone at with the EAP please call (801) 587-9319 or (800) 926-9619.
Here is a resource you may find helpful, Assess Your Stress Article and Assessment: https://accelerate.uofuhealth.utah.edu/resilience/assess-your-stress-where-are-you-on-the-stress-continuum

assess_stress.name: I want to make my own plan.
assess_stress.pdf_box: Learn how to assess your stress.

full.text: Stress is a part of life - but it doesn't have to run your life. Understanding what triggers your stress is the first step toward managing it in a healthier, more intentional way. By identifying your unique stressors and creating a personalized plan to address them, you can build resilience, improve your well-being, and feel more in control of your day-to-day. Whether it's work, relationships, or just the pace of life, small changes can lead to big relief.
Learn how to assess your stress: https://admin.healthcare.utah.edu/sites/g/files/zrelqx136/files/media/documents/2024/assess-your-stress.pdf
Resiliency Tools: https://www.resiliency.tools/

stress_exercise.name: I want to join an exercise class.

full.text: Feeling overwhelmed? Exercise is one of the most effective — and natural — ways to manage stress. Physical activity boosts your mood, clears your mind, and helps your body process tension in a healthy way.Joining an exercise class adds structure, motivation, and community to your routine. Whether it's yoga, strength training, or a dance class, moving with others can lift your spirits and help you stay committed to your well-being.
https://peak.webapps.med.utah.edu/category/132

leisure.name: I want to schedule a free Leisure Consultation

full.text: Leisure isn't lazy - it's essential. In today's hustle culture, we often overlook the value of rest, play, and personal time. Our in-person Leisure Consultation helps you rethink your relationship with free time and discover how leisure can support your health, identity, and overall well-being.
In this one-on-one session, you'll:
Explore how you currently spend your time
Identify gaps, stress points, and opportunities for joy
Reframe your mindset around rest and productivity
Build a personalized plan for meaningful, energizing leisure
Whether you're navigating a life transition, seeking better work-life balance, or simply want to reconnect with what brings you joy - this session is for you.
Make time for what matters. Book your Leisure Consultation today.

eap.name: EAP
eap.pdf_box: Supportlinc Employee Assistance Program (Use group code: uofu)

full.text: Your mental health is just as important as your physical health. It affects how you think, feel, and act—and influences every part of your life, from relationships and work to sleep and self-esteem. The Employee Assistance program is always available if you ever need any support. supportlinc.com (group code: uofu)
We understand that making changes to your health can feel overwhelming, and sometimes the first step is simply giving yourself time.
When you're ready, we're here to support you. In the meantime, here are some helpful resources you can explore at your own pace - no pressure, just possibilities.

mental_health_provider.name: I want help finding a mental health provider
mental_health_provider.pdf_box: Supportlinc Employee Assistance Program (Use group code: uofu)

full.text: Life can be challenging, and it's okay to ask for help. Seeking mental health support is a powerful step toward healing, growth, and greater well-being.
Whether you're feeling overwhelmed, stuck, anxious, or simply need someone to talk to, connecting with a mental health professional can help you:
Gain clarity and emotional balance
Build resilience and coping strategies
Improve relationships and self-understanding
Feel more supported and less alone

HMHI Behavioral Health Network can help you find a mental health provider that fits your individual preferences, Access the Provider Directory tool here: https://apps.med.utah.edu/site/hmhibhn/a/search.aspx
Supportlinc can help connect you to the care you need in a way that fits you. Learn more at: supportlinc.com. Use group code: uofu

Your sleep fitness looks great! Sleep is a vital part of your health and performance. Just like exercise and nutrition, quality sleep is essential for energy, focus, mood, and long-term well-being.

Improving your sleep fitness means creating healthy habits that support deep, restorative rest. From setting a consistent bedtime to creating a calming nighttime routine, small changes can lead to big benefits.
We understand that making changes to your health can feel overwhelming, and sometimes the first step is simply giving yourself time.
When you're ready, we're here to support you. In the meantime, here are some helpful resources you can explore at your own pace—no pressure, just possibilities.
Sleep isn't a luxury—it's a vital part of your health and performance. Just like exercise and nutrition, quality sleep is essential for energy, focus, mood, and long-term well-being.

Improving your sleep fitness means creating healthy habits that support deep, restorative rest. From setting a consistent bedtime to creating a calming nighttime routine, small changes can lead to big benefits.

insomnia_class.name: I want to register for an online insomnia class
insomnia_class.pdf_box: A team member will contact you to schedule an appointment

full.text: The CBT-I group is intended for adults with insomnia, especially for those with difficulties that have lasted several months or more.  These difficulties can include problems falling asleep, staying asleep, or waking up too early, that negatively impact your quality of life.

This treatment can work well for adults with other physical health or mental health conditions, and for people already being treated for other sleep conditions such as Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA) or Restless Leg Syndrome (RLS). If you're wondering if you have one of these sleep conditions, such as OSA or RLS, but haven't yet been diagnosed or treated for it, please talk to your primary care provider before signing up for this group.

tobacco_quit_line.name: Call the Utah Tobacco Quit Line

full.text: Quitting tobacco is one of the best decisions you can make for your health—and with Way to Quit and the Utah Tobacco Quit Line, you don’t have to do it alone. Way to Quit offers free, confidential tools to help you break free from nicotine—on your terms. Whether you prefer online support, text coaching, or a personalized quit plan, you’ll find the resources you need to succeed at waytoquit.org.Prefer to talk it out? Call the Utah Tobacco Quit Line at 1-800-QUIT-NOW for one-on-one support from trained quit coaches. You’ll get expert guidance, encouragement, and even access to free nicotine replacement therapies.

tobacco_own_plan.name: I want to make my own plan
tobacco_own_plan.pdf_box: Create your own plan. Here are some useful resources to get started.

full.text: Quitting smoking is one of the most powerful steps you can take for your health - and it's never too late to start. From boosting your energy and lung function to reducing your risk of serious illness, the benefits begin almost immediately.
You don't have to do it alone. With the right tools, support, and mindset, you can break free from tobacco and reclaim your well-being.
You've Chosen Your Path - We're Here to Support It

alcohol_eap.name: I want to work with SupportLinc to address my substance use.
alcohol_eap.pdf_box: Supportlinc Employee Assistance Program (Use group code: uofu)

full.text: SupportLinc’s Employee Assistance Program (EAP) and the innovative Addiction Care Navigator, help is just a click away.

The Addiction Care Navigator offers a quick, clinically validated assessment to help you understand your risk level and create a personalized action plan. Whether you need short-term counseling or more intensive treatment, SupportLinc connects you to the right care—fast.

If your assessment shows elevated risk, a trained Addiction Care Coach will reach out (with your consent) to guide you through treatment options, verify insurance coverage, and even help make the call to a provider.
We understand that making changes to your health can feel overwhelming, and sometimes the first step is simply giving yourself time.
When you're ready, we're here to support you. In the meantime, here are some helpful resources you can explore at your own pace - no pressure, just possibilities.
